sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"记忆，记住，回忆"之意。
means: memorize ： 指有意识的下功夫把某事的整个细节都记在脑子里。
remember ： 含义较广，多指无意识地回忆起往事，也可指通过主观努力去记忆。
recall比remember文雅，指想方设法回忆已经遗忘之事。
recollect ： 指在记忆中搜索，设法想起一时想不起的事情或人，强调过程。
remind ： 指经某人或某事的提醒而回忆起某件已遗忘之事。

sentence.Network_en: The cliffs, lapped by a crystal-clear sea, remind her of Capri.
sentence.Network_cn: 清澈的海水拍打着悬崖峭壁，令她想起了卡普里。

sentence.Network_en: Daytime television tended to remind her too forcefully of her own situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 日间电视节目往往使她深刻地认识到自身的境况。

sentence.Network_en: She resolved that, if Mimi forgot this promise, she would remind her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她决定，如果米米忘记了这个承诺，她就提醒她。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from re- 'again' + the verb mind, probably suggested by obsolete rememorate, in the same sense

encyclopedia.content: 人物简介 姓名： Kim Sung Sik 韩文名：김성식 中文译名：金圣植 生日：1986年7月20日 血型：O型 座右铭：积极地活着 国籍： 韩国 现效力战队：EHOME 曾效力战队：WE；SK；nGize；FstA；MYM]；Mojawi) BN帐号：Phoenix_ReMinD 种族：Night Elf 韩国在WCG魔兽争霸项目上的第一位冠军获得者 是电子竞技区中为数不多的用左手拿鼠标右手操作键盘的职业选手。荣誉 个人荣誉（冠军）： XP League Champio

entry.def: If someone reminds you of a fact or event that you already know about, they say something which makes you think about it.

example.ex: So she simply welcomed him and reminded him of the last time they had met...
example.tran: 于是她只是对他表示欢迎，并且提醒说他们上次见过面。

example.ex: I had to remind myself that being confident is not the same as being perfect!
example.tran: 我得提醒自己表现得自信和表现得完美并不是一回事！

entry.tran: 让我提醒你…/我能提醒你…
entry.def: You use remind in expressions such as Let me remind you that and May I remind you that to introduce a piece of information that you want to emphasize. It may be something that the hearer already knows about or a new piece of information. Sometimes these expressions can sound unfriendly.

example.ex: 'Let me remind you,' said Marianne, 'that Manchester is also my home town.'...
example.tran: “让我来提醒你，”玛丽安娜说，“曼彻斯特也是我的家乡。”

example.ex: May I remind you that the care of your health is a religious duty...
example.tran: 我可以提醒你呵护自己的健康是一项宗教责任吗？

entry.tran: 提醒(某人做某事);使想起(做某事)
entry.def: If someone reminds you to do a particular thing, they say something which makes you remember to do it.

example.ex: Can you remind me to buy a bottle of Martini?...
example.tran: 你能提醒我买一瓶马提尼酒吗？

example.ex: The note was to remind him about something he had to explain to one of his students.
example.tran: 这张字条是要提醒他得向他的一个学生解释某件事情。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something reminds you of another person or thing, you mean that they are similar to the other person or thing and that they make you think about them.

example.ex: She reminds me of the wife of the pilot who used to work for you...
example.tran: 她让我想到过去为你工作的飞行员的妻子。

example.ex: This reminds me of Christmas parties.

means.word_mean: 1. put in the mind of someone;
2. assist (somebody acting or reciting) by suggesting the next words of something forgotten or imperfectly learned

auth_sentence.content: BTW does Philip Lahm remind anybody of Gary Neville?

auth_sentence.content: Why they remind themselves about their old age?.
auth_sentence.res_content: Why they remind themselves about their old age?.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why they remind themselves about their old age?.

auth_sentence.content: I remind myself that Hamm is not Donald Draper.
auth_sentence.res_content: I remind myself that Hamm is not Donald Draper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I remind myself that Hamm is not Donald Draper.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mind思考,神智→v.介意;在乎 n.头脑;思想;主意
mind思考,神智→v.介意;在乎 n.头脑;思想;主意
re再+mind=ment思考,神智→再次思考→提醒

Sentence.sentence: Many proverbs remind people of the values that are important in the culture.
Heidrich now visits websites that discuss gaming addiction regularly "to remind myself to keep my love for online games in check.
This reminds me unpleasantly of Sunnyhill School in Streatham, with its harsh tarmac, where I used to hang about in corners fantasising about wildlife.
Most of them remind me of the stuff my nephew brings home from the kindergarten.
Few of us wish to turn the clock back, but perhaps we need to remind ourselves how useful the right obstacles can be.
When telegraphs and trains brought in the idea that convenience was more important than content, Henry David Thoreau reminded us that'

sentences.en: If my father forgets it, I hope you would remind him.
sentences.cn: 如果我父亲忘了的话, 希望你能提醒他一下。

sentences.en: When I reminded her, she nodded her head.
sentences.cn: 我提醒她时, 她点了点头。

sentences.en: Please remind me in case I should forget.
sentences.cn: 如果我忘了, 请你提醒我一下。

sentences.en: The lady didn't like to be reminded.
sentences.cn: 那位太太不喜欢人们提醒她。

sentences.en: Be sure to remind her to come back early.
sentences.cn: 一定要提醒她早点回来。

sentences.en: He reminded himself to thank her for the present.
sentences.cn: 他提醒自己要感谢她送的礼物。

sentences.en: He reminded me to lock up the house when I go out.
sentences.cn: 他提醒我外出时把屋子锁起来。

sentences.en: These notes will remind you what to say.
sentences.cn: 这些笔记可以帮你记起要说哪些话。

sentences.en: These notes will remind you how to present your ideas.
sentences.cn: 这些笔记可以帮你记起怎样讲清楚你的意思。

sentences.en: He reminded me when to go.
sentences.cn: 他提醒我是不是我该走了。

sentences.en: She reminded me that I hadn't written to Mother.
sentences.cn: 她提醒我还没有给母亲写信。

sentences.en: That suddenly reminded her that she had promised to ring them up.
sentences.cn: 这突然使她想起她说过要给他们打电话的。

sentences.en: Please remind him that we are leaving at six tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 请提醒他我们明晨6时出发。

sentences.en: I must remind him that time is money.
sentences.cn: 我必须提醒他时间就是金钱。

sentences.en: That reminds me that I have a meeting to attend this evening.
sentences.cn: 这使我想起今晚我还有一个会要参加。

sentences.en: May I remind you that time will soon be up?
sentences.cn: 我可以提醒你时间快到了吗?

sentences.en: The sight of the clock remind-ed me that I was late.
sentences.cn: 看到时钟使我想起我迟到了。

sentences.en: We reminded them that the meeting had been postponed.
sentences.cn: 我们提醒他们会议已经延期。

sentences.en: I always remind myself that time and tide wait for no man.
sentences.cn: 我总是提醒自己岁月不待人。

sentences.en: He reminded her that they had resolved to stick together.
sentences.cn: 他提醒她说, 他们曾经决定过彼此要在一起, 不要单独行动。

sentences.en: They reminded me that one can be strong only when united with the collective.
sentences.cn: 他们使我想到, 只有和集体结合才有力量。

sentences.en: Travellers are reminded that inoculation against yellow fever is advisable.
sentences.cn: 提醒旅游者接种预防黄热病的疫苗是明智的。

sentences.en: This reminds me what we did together during our holidays.
sentences.cn: 这使我想起我们在假日里一起做的事。

sentences.en: The time of year reminds me how the months have gone.
sentences.cn: 每年这个时候都使我想起那些月份是怎么过去的。

sentences.en: Tom reminded me when I must go.
sentences.cn: 汤姆提醒我是不是我该走了。

jushi.english: The lady didn't like to be reminded.
jushi.chinese: 那位太太不喜欢人们提醒她。

jushi.english: When I reminded her, she nodded her head.
jushi.chinese: 我提醒她时,她点了点头。

jushi.english: Please remind me in case I should forget.
jushi.chinese: 如果我忘了,请你提醒我一下。
